mapper.sql: SELECT rb_id AS rbId, rb_title AS rbTitle, rb_content AS rbContent, rb_view_cnt AS rbViewCnt, rb_like_cnt AS rbLikeCnt, rb_register_date AS rbRegisterDate, rb_update_date AS rbUpdateDate, rb_writer AS rbWriter, rb_notice_yn AS rbNoticeYn, rb_vaccine_kind AS rbVaccineKind, rb_file_name AS rbFileName, IFNULL(rb_file_path, '') AS rbFilePath

choose.when: INSERT INTO review_board(rb_title, rb_content, rb_writer, rb_vaccine_kind, rb_file_name, rb_file_path) VALUES(#{rbTitle}, #{rbContent}, #{rbWriter}, #{rbVaccineKind}, #{rbFileName}, #{rbFilePath})
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO review_board(rb_title, rb_content, rb_writer, rb_vaccine_kind) VALUES(#{rbTitle}, #{rbContent}, #{rbWriter}, #{rbVaccineKind})

mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) AS totalCnt FROM review_board
AND rb_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{rbInput}, '%')
AND rb_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{rbInput}, '%')
AND rb_vaccine_kind = #{rbVaccineKind}
,u_nickname AS uNickName FROM review_board rb JOIN user_info ui ON rb.rb_writer = ui.u_id WHERE rb_id = #{boardId}
mapper.update: UPDATE review_board SET rb_view_cnt = rb_view_cnt + 1 WHERE rb_id = #{boardId}
